identity.name: TechNexus India
identity.core_philosophy: Affordable Tech Power. No fluff, just function.
design_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Poster aesthetics with SaaS utility.
Emotion First: Trust is built through clarity and structure.
Content is King: Every pixel must serve the user's goal (booking/contact).
Negative Space: Use whitespace as a luxury material.
Contrast: High-contrast grayscale for maximum readability and impact.

usage.headings: Space Grotesk, font-bold, tracking-tight, uppercase for section titles
usage.ui_elements: Manrope, font-medium, tracking-wide, uppercase for buttons/labels

colors.e1_twist: Use a subtle 'noise' texture overlay on solid gray backgrounds to prevent digital flatness. Use high-contrast black borders (2px) for key interactive elements.

strategies.name: The Tetris Grid
strategies.description: Asymmetrical grid with spanning columns (col-span-2, col-span-1) to create visual interest.

strategies.name: The Tracing Beam
strategies.description: Cards with a subtle moving gradient border or hover glow effect.

buttons.style: Sharp edges or pill-shaped. Solid #363636 background with white text. Hover: Scale 1.05 or invert colors.
buttons.classes: bg-[#363636] text-white px-8 py-4 rounded-full font-medium transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95

cards.style: Minimalist, white background, 1px border #D3D3D3. No heavy shadows. Focus on typography and spacing.
cards.classes: bg-white border border-[#D3D3D3] p-8 rounded-xl hover:border-[#363636] transition-colors

forms.customization: Remove default rounded-md, make inputs sharp or pill. Use #F5F5F5 background for inputs.

navigation.style: Sticky glassmorphism header. Simple text links. 'Book Now' as a primary CTA button.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle grain/noise overlay on hero section.
visual_enhancers.animations: Framer Motion for scroll reveals. Staggered entrance for list items. Smooth parallax for background elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Import 'Space Grotesk' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts in index.css.
3. GLOBAL STYLES: Apply 'bg-white text-[#363636] font-sans antialiased' to body.
4. HERO: Create a split layout. Left: Massive typography 'TechNexus'. Right: Abstract geometric image or 3D element.
5. SERVICES: Use a grid of cards. Each card should have a hover effect that highlights the border.
6. FORMS: Use shadcn components for 'Book Now' and 'Schedule Call'. Ensure they are fully responsive.
7. FOOTER: Minimalist. Large 'Let's Build' text. Social links. Copyright.
8. CRITICAL: Do not use gradients. Stick to solid colors and textures. Use whitespace to create hierarchy.
